component.name: getAvatarsForProject
component.description: returns all avatars which are visible for the currently logged in user. The avatars are grouped into system and custom.

component.name: getComponentsOfProject
component.description: Contains a full representation of a the specified project's components.

component.name: getStatusesOfProject
component.description: Get all issue types with valid status values for a project.

component.name: getVersionsOfProject
component.description: Contains a full representation of a the specified project's versions.

component.name: getRolesOfProject
component.description: Contains a list of roles in this project with links to full details.

component.name: getRolesByIdOfProject
component.description: Details on a given project role.

component.name: setActorsToRoleOfProject
component.description: Set actors to a given project role.

component.name: getUserAssignableProjects
component.description: Returns a list of users that match the search string and can be assigned issues for all the given projects. This resource cannot be accessed anonymously.
